contents.text: Thank you for calling DNAnexus in South Bay, the cloud-based genome informatics and data management platform accelerating genomic medicine.
Press 1 for technical support or system status.
Press 1 to connect to a technical support specialist.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: I need help fixing a genome analysis workflow that’s failing to run.
I’m having trouble running my genome analysis pipeline and need a technical specialist to troubleshoot.
I’m encountering a runtime error in my WDL pipeline on DNAnexus and need help debugging it.
Help me log into my DNAnexus account to view my genome data
I need help troubleshooting an upload error in the DNAnexus CLI for my genomics dataset.

contents.text: Press 2 for automated system status updates.
Please hold while we retrieve the current system status.

navigationGoals: I’d like a quick update on whether the platform is experiencing any outages.
I’d like to check if there are any current outages or performance issues before I launch my job.
I want to check the current API service uptime and any active incidents on the DNAnexus platform.
I’d like to check if the DNAnexus system is up and running right now
I want to check if the DNAnexus platform is currently experiencing any outages before I begin my analysis.

contents.text: Press 2 for sales, licensing, and partnership inquiries.
Press 1 to speak with a sales representative.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for pricing details to add more user licenses.
I want to discuss licensing options for my veteran-led biotech startup’s use of your platform.
I’d like to discuss purchasing a multi-user license for our bioinformatics team.
Tell me about the cost of a personal subscription to DNAnexus
I’d like details on student pricing and licensing options for academic access to DNAnexus.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships division.

navigationGoals: I want information on partnering for API integration with our tools.
I’m interested in setting up an enterprise‐level partnership for a veteran health genomics research program.
I’m interested in exploring an enterprise integration partnership with custom API support.
I want information on partnering my community clinic with DNAnexus
I’m exploring a potential research collaboration with DNAnexus and need information on enterprise partnerships.
